pages.text: To get around to other $(aoa) dimensions, you will need to construct your own portal.$(br2)$(aoa) portals are made from $(thing)Ancient Rock$() and $(thing)Carved Runes$(), and must be constructed in a specific shape.$(br2)To make a portal frame, make a vertical, hollow rectangle out of $(thing)Ancient Rock$(), then replace the bottom center block with a $(l:aoa3:the_portal#carved_rune_of_power)Carved Rune of Power$(/l)
pages.title: The Portal

pages.text: From there, you must insert $(l)one$() of each of four $(thing)Carved Runes$() anywhere into the frame:$(br2)$(thing)Carved Rune of Reality$()$(br2)$(thing)Carved Rune of Travel$()$(br2)$(thing)Carved Rune of Space$()$(br2)$(thing)Carved Rune of Direction$()

pages.name: Teleporter Frame
pages.text: The portal must contain the 5 runes and 13 rock.

Four of the carved runes can be found throughout the Overworld, stashed away in loot chests, dropped from various creatures, or through various actions.$(br2) The fifth one; the $(l:aoa3:the_portal#carved_rune_of_power)Carved Rune of Power$(/l) is crafted by you.
Once the portal frame has been constructed, you can activate it by using a $(thing)Realmstone$() of some kind on it. One portal can be used to take you to many worlds.
More information can be found on the $(thing)official wiki$().
